sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
    <v-card :text="product_desc">

        <v-list>
            <v-list-item :prepend-avatar="'data:image/jpeg;base64,' + seller_avatar" :title="product_name" :subtitle="seller_name" />
        </v-list>

        <v-img aspect-ratio="16/9" :width="600" :src="'data:image/jpeg;base64,' + product_image" />
        <!-- <v-img :src="'data:image/jpeg;base64,' + seller_avatar" /> -->
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-divider></v-divider>
        <v-card-actions>
            <v-btn>Open chat</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
</v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'ShowProducts',
    data: () => ({
        master_available: '',
        master_not_available: ''
    }),
    props: {
        product_name: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        seller_avatar: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        seller_name: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        product_desc: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        product_image: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        product_id: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        }
    }
}
</script>
